thread.title: 11 Things You Need To Stop Saying To The Token Black Girl At Work
thread.title_full: 11 Things You Need To Stop Saying To The Token Black Girl At Work

author: SadeASpence
title: 11 Things You Need To Stop Saying To The Token Black Girl At Work
text:
View this image › 
Via Twitter: @kurlykyyla ID: 10320471 2. Followed by, “Is that all your real hair?” View this image › 
Via tumblr.com ID: 10320744 3. [Pointing at one other black person in the office] “You two should date!” View this image › 
Oxygen Because color makes us compatible, right?
ID: 10320651 4. “You’re so pretty for a black girl.” View this image › 
Bravo / Via tumblr.com ID: 10320806 5. That name is beautiful… did your parents make it up? View this image › 
Via tumblr.com ID: 10320765 6. “And I was like… ‘Oh no she didn’t!’” View this image › 
OWN ID: 10320790 7. “What does * insert overused urban slang here* mean?” View this image › 
HBO Don’t assume we know… although we probably do.
ID: 10320509 8. “I need to stay out of the sun, I’m getting so dark.” View this image › 
Via tumblr.com ID: 10320886 9. [While dancing] “Am I doing it right?” View this image › 
Via media.giphy.com Probably not, but let’s roll with it.
ID: 10320796 10. “What’s the name of that one black guy in that movie?” View this image › 
Bravo What’s the name of that popular search engine? Ah yes, Google.
ID: 10320642 11. And, “Wow, you don’t sound black.” View this image › 
Bravo ID: 10320768 Make it stop! #girlbye View this image › 
Via m.popkey.co ID: 10321224 Did you know you can sign up for a BuzzFeed account and create your own Community posts? Get started here ! ID: 10327258 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
This post was created by a member of BuzzFeed Community, where anyone can post awesome lists and creations. Learn more or post your buzz!
